Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-02

- TypeScript (strict mode), Bun runtime for backend + React Native 0.83.x, Expo SDK, Socket.io (client & server), React Native Track Player, Web Audio API, neteasecloudmusicapienhanced/api (001-realtime-sync-player)

```text

tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript (strict mode), Bun runtime for backend: Follow standard conventions
